servinfo.title: Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle with A/C ON for 10 minutes.
Recover refrigerant from the A/C system using recovery and recycling equipment referring to “Recovery” in Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant .

attention3.ptxt: The amount of compressor at removed must be measured and the same amount must be poured when installing the compressor.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect suction and discharge hoses from compressor.

attention3.ptxt: Cap open fitting immediately to keep moisture out of system.

s1.ptxt: Remove compressor drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Remove compressor with clutch assembly from its mount.

attention3.ptxt: If compressor assembly is replaced with one, drain oil from compressor. Then, measure its amount.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following instructions.

item.ptxt: If compressor is replaced, pour new compressor oil referring to Precautions on Replenishing Compressor Oil .
Evacuate and charge the A/C system referring to “Evacuation” and “Charge” in Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant .
Adjust drive belt tension referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment for M16 Engine Model .

torqueitem.t-part: Compressor mounting bolt for M16 engine model
